mapper.select: SELECT time,phone_number ,cellname ,COUNT(*) as countnum FROM( SELECT a.phone_number,a.record_time as time,a.live_cellname1 as cellname FROM t_complaint_residentarea a WHERE a.record_time LIKE '%2017-08-01%' union SELECT b.phone_number,b.record_time as time ,b.live_cellname2 as cellname FROM t_complaint_residentarea b WHERE b.record_time LIKE '%2017-08-01%' union SELECT c.phone_number,c.record_time as time ,c.live_cellname3 as cellname FROM t_complaint_residentarea c WHERE c.record_time LIKE '%2017-08-01%' )t WHERE cellname !='' GROUP BY cellname ORDER BY countnum DESC;

SELECT t1.record_time,t1.phone_number,t1.complaint_detailinfo,t2.live_cellname1,t2.live_cellname2,t2.live_cellname3 FROM t_complaint_detail t1,t_complaint_residentarea t2 WHERE t1.phone_number=t2.phone_number AND left(t1.record_time,10)=left(t2.record_time,10) AND (t2.live_cellname1=#{cellname} OR t2.live_cellname2=#{cellname} OR t2.live_cellname3=#{cellname} ) ORDER BY t1.record_time
SELECT record_time,phone_number,live_cellname1,live_cellname2,live_cellname3 FROM t_complaint_residentarea ORDER BY record_time limit 1000

SELECT record_time,phone_number,live_cellname1,live_cellname2,live_cellname3 FROM( SELECT phone_number,record_time,live_cellname1,live_cellname2,live_cellname3 FROM t_complaint_residentarea WHERE live_cellname1 LIKE #{cellname} OR live_cellname2 LIKE #{cellname} OR live_cellname3 LIKE #{cellname})t WHERE record_time LIKE '%2017-08-01%'
